title: In Leaked Messages, Boris Johnson Called His Health Secretary ‘Hopeless’
content:
1. In Leaked Messages, Boris Johnson Called His Health Secretary ‘Hopeless’  The New York Times
  2. Johnson called Hancock 'totally hopeless' in message, says Cummings  Channel 4 News
  3. Boris Johnson calls Matt Hancock hopeless in texts revealed by Dominic Cummings  BBC News
  4. ‘Hopeless’ Matt Hancock humiliated by Boris Johnson’s WhatsApp messages – The Yorkshire Post says  The Yorkshire Post
  5. Dominic Cummings’s disclosures are as embarrassing for Boris Johnson as they are for Matt Hancock  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ボリス・ジョンソン、流出したメッセージで保健省長官を「Hopeless」と呼ぶ
在泄露的信息中，鲍里斯-约翰逊称他的卫生部长 "没有希望"。
在泄露的信息中，鮑里斯-約翰遜稱他的衛生部長 "沒有希望"。
